TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Eritrea, title = Eritrea, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eritrea} }

S.FORM: Eritrea u Eritrea sa i labu nu Feico, itiza i 15 00 N, 39 00 E u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 117,600 km2, u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 101,000 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 16,600 km2 hamin nu tademawan sa 5,869,869. kakalukan umah sa 75.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 15.10%, zumaay henay umah sa 9.80%. Er-li-cyu-ya u pu a kamu : (Yin a kamu: State of Eritrea, Ti-ke-lei-ni-ya a kamu : ሃገረ ኤርትራ,a-liدولة إرتريا), pulung nu ngangan Er-li-cyu-ya, na i Fuy-cul sawali nu amisay a kanatal mitepal tu sumanahay a bayu, u ahebal nu lala' sabaw tusa idaw ku lima a mang nu pin-fang-kung-li, u tademaw sa 5,750,433 (2018 a mihcaan), u eneng nu tatanghan i A-si-ma-la, u binacadan sa u Ti-ke-li-ni-yaay a tademaw, u Ti-ke-lei a tademaw ku situngusay hawsa. u cacukaymasan tu kalisiw nu nay-ke-fa. tada yadah ku caay katatudung a tademaw tayni mikawaw mamin i Er-li-cyu-ya, u sihu ku misakakuay mikuwan tu tademaw makuwan nu sihu pihaceng milisapen, sikasa u hamin nu kitakit i sinbung salihalay sa misaliyud ku kawaw u sanayi'ay a kakitidaan ku mahiniay, kyu katuud ku tademaw hina sakamu tu u ''fuy-culay a pei-han''. (u kamu nu Hulam: 厄利垂亞國伯語:(英語:State of Eritrea, ") tapang tusu nu kanatal u tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Asmara. kakininan nu kanatal demiad kakining nu kanatal demiad sa 24 bulad 5 demiad. tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Isaias Afwerki, micakat a demiad sa i 1993 a mihca 5 bulad 24 demiad. laylay Er-li-cuy-ya naw u i Yi-sul-pi-ya a nikedalan patidengan, 1890 a mihcaan nidebungan nu Yi-ta-li, malu nu malimaday muenen Yi-ta-li tu a kakitidaan, nadikudan nu sakatusa a nikalpacaw i kitakit u malkaputay a kanatal masasulul satu sa, atu i-su-pi-ya malaheci ku nisakaputan tu Yi-sul-pi-ya atu Er-li cuy-ya malcabayay a masakaput. 1962 a mihcaan maalaw nu Yi-sul-pi-ya, malu nu sabaw sepad a kididaan nu nian tu a kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam: 14個省.) mihulakay masakaputay i 1960 a mihcaan u ziday napatideng tu Er-li-cuy-ya, u nikadademec mialaw tu Er-li-cuy-ya kyu miliyas ku Yi-su-pi-ya. Er-li-cuy-ya a tademaw mahulaka kina masakaputay i 1970 a mihcaan nu ziday i Yi-sa-ya-si-a-fui-wo-er-ci ya mikelidan u nikasa tu Er-li-cuy-ya mihulakay masakaputay malaliyas tahkal, haymaw sa tu maday-li nu dikudan alaw malu nu Yi-sul-pi-ya nu maylabuay tu u kahenulan ku Er-li-cuy-ya u misataeday a paculi nu hitay. Yi-sul-pi-ya u men-ke-si-tu nipikuwan i 1991 a mihcaan mapabelin satu sa, Mi-lay-si-ce-na-wya a nisabaluhay tu sihu masasulit i Er-li-cuy-ya pasakawaw tu tademaw a paina, palucek tina kenisan tatenga' haw sa miliyas tu Yi-sul-pi-ya. 1993 a mihcaan sepatay a bulad hebek satu i masacabaay a kanatal u matatudungay ku mikawaw atu u mikantukay malingatu tu paina ku tademaw, namahida u siwa a bataan idaw ku siwa nu walu pay-hun-pi ya paliliday makaawas tu miliyas ku Yi-sul-pi-ya, sakay wida tu a mihcaan i limaay a bulad tusa a bataan idaw ku sepatay a demiad pacudad masacacaay kunida sa. 1994 a mihcaan, u Er-li-cuy-ya a tademaw mihulakay masakaputay misumad tu nu tademawan a nu binawlan misakaku atu palucekay tu sakay kawaw nu niyadu. (u kamu nu Hulam: .) 2018 a mihcaan pitu a bulad, Yi-sul-pi-ya atu Er-li-cuy-ya madem tu ku nikasasuadan hawsa, Yi-sul-pi-ya u tatangahan ci A-pi-ay-ha-may-tu-a-li kilusa mididaw mipalita tu Er-li-cuy-ya masasulit tu sakakapah nikaudipan. kina tusaay a tatangahan, u satalakaway malingatu mahtatusaay u sakasikalisiw, u manamec, u sapitupin atu masasungaay nu mapapaliyuh. (u kamu nu Hulam: 2018年7月, .) kamu nu aydaay yadah ku caay kalecad a kamu i Er-li-cuy-ya misakamu, namakayni i San-mi-te a kamu atu Ku-si-te a kamu. i Er-li-cuy-ya u kamu nu sakamuan nu binacadan idaw ku A-la-pul, Ti-ke-lei a kamu, Ti-ke-li-ni-ya a kamu atu nu aydaay a sakamuan tu Ta-li-ke a kamu(Dahlik), kina kanatal malakuid tu waluay tu a tademaw misakamu tu kamu(u kahenulin u Ti-ke-lei a kamu atu Ti-ke-li-ni-ya a kamu) u nu saayway a kamu. Yin-kul a kamu atu Yi-ta-li a kamu idaw tu ku misakamuay a tandaw. anu sakaykawaw sa u kahenulan tu Ti-ke-li-ni-ya atu a-li-pul a kamu. Ti-ke-li-ni-ya a kamu taneng musakamu tu Ci-ce a sulit tu sasulitan. (u kamu nu Hulam: (Dahlik), .) demiad talakaway nu kenis u sakapahay u sasapian nu tademaw a demiad, tu mihcaan sa u dihku nu akuti' i sabaw cacay idaw ku pitu C, u selep nu nanam 525 haw-mi. sabaw tusa a bulad katukuh i tusaay a bulad u saselepay ku demiad nu akuti', i sabaw lima C, lima a bulad katukuh i enemay a bulad u satalakaway ku akuti' nu demiad, i tusa a bataan idaw ku lima C; sepatay a bulad katukuh i limaay a bulad u maudaday a demiad, enem a bulad katukuh waluay a bulad u musaaangsangay a udad nu demiad, nikahida sa u makedalay a demiad. sawali atu satipanay u masawahulay micidek ku caledes maacak ku demiad, tu mihmihcaan sa u akuti' nu demiad i tulu C atu tusa C, tu mihmihcaan nu mudebuay nu nanam sa caay pakaala tu 400 haw-mi. ya sumanahay a bayu miduducay tu tukus u likelikenan, tulu a bulad katukuh i cacay bataan a bulad i demiad sa u lababaan kya demiad makatukuh ku sepatay C ay. (u kamu nu Hulam: 40℃以上.) Er-li-cuy-ya u liwliw nu likut masasuedes Er-li-cuy-ya u liwliw nu likut masasuedes nasulitan nu wikipitiya, Er-li-cuy-ya i 1950 a mihcaan milabu tu i-su-pi-ya masakaputay; i 1962 a mihcaan, hungti nu Yi-su-pi-ya ci Say-li-si-i-se (Haile Selassie l) pakunida han tu mihulak kina malpadangay a kanatal a mikayki, lucek han mikumkum kina malpadangay a kanatal , u masacacay muawaw patayda tu tademaw palcapu tu "Er-li-cuy-ya mihulakay masakaputay" , atu Yi-su-pi-ya malingatu makaali tu tuluay a mihcaan kuheni masasuayaw a malpacaw. (u kamu nu Hulam: (Haile Selassie I) .) nudaan tu masasuayaw malalaisan u Ti-ke-lei a tademaw a nihulakan tu masakaputay atu Er-li-cuy-ya a tademaw nu mahulakay u masakaputay a nikalcabacabayan. 1991 a mihcaan. nu i paykanatal miwananay sa, Er-li-cuy-ya a tademaw u mihulikay masakapud patideng tu tada malakuwid ku nisakakuan nu sihu, nu dikidan i tusa a mihcaan hamin nu niyadu' namakaaaay i Yi-su-pi-ya ku nika sacacay a milapu tu masakaputay a kanatal. (u kamu nu Hulam: .) 1991 a mihcaan, kina tusaay masasulid tu cacay a wiy-yun-huy a mihalhal tu kapahay a kawaw anu u canan ku nika dademec tu sakay mungday, nika nikahini nu heni tu demidemiad sa mangalep ku nikasasulinges. (u kamu nu Hulam: 1991年, .) u heni tu ku malpacaway, kina tusaay naidaw ku nika sasulitan a mapapela' tu sin-ceng a kenis; nika masakunida ku Er-li-cuy-ya tu nadikudan, caay kasasulul kina tusaay a mipela' tu kenis. 1997 a mihcaan sabaw cacay a bulad tusaay idaw kuwalu a demiad, u Er-li-cuy-ya misabaluhay patahkal tu kalisiw u nay-ke-fa, Yi-su-pi-ya nikahida sakay i Er-li-cuy-ya misulul tu sakay kalisiw a mipulu', kina tusaay masakaputay ngalep sa tu ku nikasasulinges, kilulsatu satu nadikudan i 1998-2000 a mihcaan mapelpel tu i likut nu liuliyuan nu dadipasan a mangangayaw. (u kamu nu Hulam: .) malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan CIA 外交部

Eritrea o Eritrea sa i labo no Feico, itiza i 15 00 N, 39 00 E o ahebal no lala' mapolong sa izaw ko 117,600 km2, o ahebal no lala'ay sa izaw ko 101,000 km2, o ahebal no nanomay sa izaw ko 16,600 km2 hamin no tademawan sa 5,869,869. kakalokan omah sa 75.10%, kilakilangan omah sa 15.10%, zomaay henay omah sa 9.80%. Er-li-cyo-ya o po a kamo : (Yin a kamo: State of Eritrea, Ti-ke-lei-ni-ya a kamo : ሃገረ ኤርትራ,a-liدولة إرتريا), polong no ngangan Er-li-cyo-ya, na i Foy-col sawali no amisay a kanatal mitepal to somanahay a bayo, o ahebal no lala' sabaw tosa idaw ko lima a mang no pin-fang-kong-li, o tademaw sa 5,750,433 (2018 a mihcaan), o eneng no tatanghan i A-si-ma-la, o binacadan sa o Ti-ke-li-ni-yaay a tademaw, o Ti-ke-lei a tademaw ko sitongosay hawsa. o cacokaymasan to kalisiw no nay-ke-fa. tada yadah ko caay katatodong a tademaw tayni mikawaw mamin i Er-li-cyo-ya, o siho ko misakakoay mikowan to tademaw makowan no siho pihaceng milisapen, sikasa o hamin no kitakit i sinbong salihalay sa misaliyod ko kawaw o sanayi'ay a kakitidaan ko mahiniay, kyo katood ko tademaw hina sakamo to o ''foy-colay a pei-han''. (o kamo no Holam: 厄利垂亞國伯語:(英語:State of Eritrea, ") tapang toso no kanatal o tapang toso no kanatal sa o Asmara. kakininan no kanatal demiad kakining no kanatal demiad sa 24 bolad 5 demiad. tabakiay a tapang no kanatal o tabakiay a tapang no kanatal (congtong) ayza sa ci Isaias Afwerki, micakat a demiad sa i 1993 a mihca 5 bolad 24 demiad. laylay Er-li-coy-ya naw o i Yi-sol-pi-ya a nikedalan patidengan, 1890 a mihcaan nidebongan no Yi-ta-li, malo no malimaday moenen Yi-ta-li to a kakitidaan, nadikodan no sakatosa a nikalpacaw i kitakit o malkapotay a kanatal masasolol sato sa, ato i-so-pi-ya malaheci ko nisakapotan to Yi-sol-pi-ya ato Er-li coy-ya malcabayay a masakapot. 1962 a mihcaan maalaw no Yi-sol-pi-ya, malo no sabaw sepad a kididaan no nian to a kanatal. (o kamo no Holam: 14個省.) miholakay masakapotay i 1960 a mihcaan o ziday napatideng to Er-li-coy-ya, o nikadademec mialaw to Er-li-coy-ya kyo miliyas ko Yi-so-pi-ya. Er-li-coy-ya a tademaw maholaka kina masakapotay i 1970 a mihcaan no ziday i Yi-sa-ya-si-a-foi-wo-er-ci ya mikelidan o nikasa to Er-li-coy-ya miholakay masakapotay malaliyas tahkal, haymaw sa to maday-li no dikodan alaw malo no Yi-sol-pi-ya no maylaboay to o kahenolan ko Er-li-coy-ya o misataeday a pacoli no hitay. Yi-sol-pi-ya o men-ke-si-to nipikowan i 1991 a mihcaan mapabelin sato sa, Mi-lay-si-ce-na-wya a nisabalohay to siho masasolit i Er-li-coy-ya pasakawaw to tademaw a paina, palocek tina kenisan tatenga' haw sa miliyas to Yi-sol-pi-ya. 1993 a mihcaan sepatay a bolad hebek sato i masacabaay a kanatal o matatodongay ko mikawaw ato o mikantokay malingato to paina ko tademaw, namahida o siwa a bataan idaw ko siwa no walo pay-hon-pi ya paliliday makaawas to miliyas ko Yi-sol-pi-ya, sakay wida to a mihcaan i limaay a bolad tosa a bataan idaw ko sepatay a demiad pacodad masacacaay konida sa. 1994 a mihcaan, o Er-li-coy-ya a tademaw miholakay masakapotay misomad to no tademawan a no binawlan misakako ato palocekay to sakay kawaw no niyado. (o kamo no Holam: .) 2018 a mihcaan pito a bolad, Yi-sol-pi-ya ato Er-li-coy-ya madem to ko nikasasoadan hawsa, Yi-sol-pi-ya o tatangahan ci A-pi-ay-ha-may-to-a-li kilosa mididaw mipalita to Er-li-coy-ya masasolit to sakakapah nikaodipan. kina tosaay a tatangahan, o satalakaway malingato mahtatosaay o sakasikalisiw, o manamec, o sapitopin ato masasongaay no mapapaliyoh. (o kamo no Holam: 2018年7月, .) kamo no aydaay yadah ko caay kalecad a kamo i Er-li-coy-ya misakamo, namakayni i San-mi-te a kamo ato Ko-si-te a kamo. i Er-li-coy-ya o kamo no sakamoan no binacadan idaw ko A-la-pol, Ti-ke-lei a kamo, Ti-ke-li-ni-ya a kamo ato no aydaay a sakamoan to Ta-li-ke a kamo(Dahlik), kina kanatal malakoid to waloay to a tademaw misakamo to kamo(o kahenolin o Ti-ke-lei a kamo ato Ti-ke-li-ni-ya a kamo) o no saayway a kamo. Yin-kol a kamo ato Yi-ta-li a kamo idaw to ko misakamoay a tandaw. ano sakaykawaw sa o kahenolan to Ti-ke-li-ni-ya ato a-li-pol a kamo. Ti-ke-li-ni-ya a kamo taneng mosakamo to Ci-ce a solit to sasolitan. (o kamo no Holam: (Dahlik), .) demiad talakaway no kenis o sakapahay o sasapian no tademaw a demiad, to mihcaan sa o dihko no akoti' i sabaw cacay idaw ko pito C, o selep no nanam 525 haw-mi. sabaw tosa a bolad katokoh i tosaay a bolad o saselepay ko demiad no akoti', i sabaw lima C, lima a bolad katokoh i enemay a bolad o satalakaway ko akoti' no demiad, i tosa a bataan idaw ko lima C; sepatay a bolad katokoh i limaay a bolad o maodaday a demiad, enem a bolad katokoh waloay a bolad o mosaaangsangay a odad no demiad, nikahida sa o makedalay a demiad. sawali ato satipanay o masawaholay micidek ko caledes maacak ko demiad, to mihmihcaan sa o akoti' no demiad i tolo C ato tosa C, to mihmihcaan no modeboay no nanam sa caay pakaala to 400 haw-mi. ya somanahay a bayo midodocay to tokos o likelikenan, tolo a bolad katokoh i cacay bataan a bolad i demiad sa o lababaan kya demiad makatokoh ko sepatay C ay. (o kamo no Holam: 40℃以上.) Er-li-coy-ya o liwliw no likot masasoedes Er-li-coy-ya o liwliw no likot masasoedes nasolitan no wikipitiya, Er-li-coy-ya i 1950 a mihcaan milabo to i-so-pi-ya masakapotay; i 1962 a mihcaan, hongti no Yi-so-pi-ya ci Say-li-si-i-se (Haile Selassie l) pakonida han to miholak kina malpadangay a kanatal a mikayki, locek han mikomkom kina malpadangay a kanatal , o masacacay moawaw patayda to tademaw palcapo to "Er-li-coy-ya miholakay masakapotay" , ato Yi-so-pi-ya malingato makaali to toloay a mihcaan koheni masasoayaw a malpacaw. (o kamo no Holam: (Haile Selassie I) .) nodaan to masasoayaw malalaisan o Ti-ke-lei a tademaw a niholakan to masakapotay ato Er-li-coy-ya a tademaw no maholakay o masakapotay a nikalcabacabayan. 1991 a mihcaan. no i paykanatal miwananay sa, Er-li-coy-ya a tademaw o miholikay masakapod patideng to tada malakowid ko nisakakoan no siho, no dikidan i tosa a mihcaan hamin no niyado' namakaaaay i Yi-so-pi-ya ko nika sacacay a milapo to masakapotay a kanatal. (o kamo no Holam: .) 1991 a mihcaan, kina tosaay masasolid to cacay a wiy-yon-hoy a mihalhal to kapahay a kawaw ano o canan ko nika dademec to sakay mongday, nika nikahini no heni to demidemiad sa mangalep ko nikasasolinges. (o kamo no Holam: 1991年, .) o heni to ko malpacaway, kina tosaay naidaw ko nika sasolitan a mapapela' to sin-ceng a kenis; nika masakonida ko Er-li-coy-ya to nadikodan, caay kasasolol kina tosaay a mipela' to kenis. 1997 a mihcaan sabaw cacay a bolad tosaay idaw kowalo a demiad, o Er-li-coy-ya misabalohay patahkal to kalisiw o nay-ke-fa, Yi-so-pi-ya nikahida sakay i Er-li-coy-ya misolol to sakay kalisiw a mipolo', kina tosaay masakapotay ngalep sa to ko nikasasolinges, kilolsato sato nadikodan i 1998-2000 a mihcaan mapelpel to i likot no lioliyoan no dadipasan a mangangayaw. (o kamo no Holam: .) malalitin to ihekalay ato zomaay a natinengan CIA 外交部
